snippet: Kevin Darden, 34, charged with murder after Wai Kuen Kwok, 61, was shoved into the path of a train on Sunday, was also a suspect in a Nov. 6 shoving episode.
abstract: New York City Police say Kevin Darden has been charged with fatally shoving Wai Kuen Kwok into path of oncoming subway train in the Bronx; Darden was taken into custody in separate assault at Manhattan subway station after pushing another man to subway platform.

byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller and Kate Pastor contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Kevin Darden, 34, charged with murder after Wai Kuen Kwok, 61, was shoved into the path of a train on Sunday, was also a suspect in a Nov. 6 shoving episode.

headline.main: Man Charged With Fatal Shoving of New York Subway Rider
headline.print_headline: Man Is Charged With Shove That Killed a Subway Rider in the Bronx
